QuestData.Title: Shapes Beyond the Veil
QuestData.RewardText:
Greetings, dear friend.
You have done much to aid us in your time here, but I can sense fate calls you elsewhere.
In honor of the many souls you have rescued on your journey, and to serve as a guiding light for those you have yet to encounter, please accept this gift. May it serve as a reminder of what wonder life can bring when given a little assistance.
